JOB DESCRIPTION: We  are looking for database developer with advance T-Sql  Concepts,sql queries,creating table stored procedures, functions, views,  DML,DDL.indexing and optimization,writing complex SQL queries . Your  primary responsibilities will be to develop these applications as per the  specified design, and to coordinate with the rest of the team working on  different layers of the infrastructure. Therefore, a commitment to problem  solving and quality product is essential.Responsibilities:Build  and maintain efficient, reusable, and reliable T-SQL code.Provide  support to the users of the software.Ensure  the best possible performance, quality, and responsiveness of applications.Required Candidate profileMust  have Skills: T-Sql Concepts, Sql queries,creating table stored procedures,  functions, views, DML,DDL.indexing and optimization,writing complex SQL queries  . Should  be a team player   Desirable  Skills: Working  Knowledge of C# .NET and Asp.NET , power BI will be a plus.
